title: If I buy Urgot what are the chances of other players letting me play him
body: I've heard that alot players don't like Urgot so I was wondering if I was to buy him would other players get angry if I pick him

replies.body: in normals it should be fine. I mean sometimes you will get someone who doesn't want you to play him like most off meta champs. Urgot just happens to be famous for being the most off meta champ. So as long as you are ok with him i would see no problems :D
Thank you for all the responses you all have been very help full
There is a guy that played 3 or 4 thousand ranked games with him last season alone, you should be fine.
You don't play him until he gets his rework.

Urgot is fine in top lane, he can bully people if you know what you're doing, problem with him is that he doesn't really scale into late, disregarding your performance early.

And his ulti is too situational to make use of it outside 1v1.

*Picks Urgot*

Me: Argue with me and i'm locking in.
Play in normals. Play in ranked only if you are really good at him or hes just %%%% in this meta.

Urgot top can actually be decent. A lot of people say "pfft Urgot" and then give up first blood for underestimating his damage

Urgot ADC isn't that good.
